title: my love my life my thoughts by vivienne alonge poems love life emotions lasting
description: Hi I am Vivienne the author of this book. For many years I have written down my thoughts about love, family and places I have been. Some romantic, some funny and some are just images of what I have seen. I hope my readers will enjoy these memories and feelings. I still believe the world is a beautul place.
author: Vivienne Alonge
